lines.text: [Teele has just told Toots that she wants to marry him]

[confused]
Well, if you aren't joking, then it's quite a funny joke, but if you are, then... Yes.

[with relief]
Finally I got this feeble "Yes" from you!
[Kiir has come to Toots's farm to learn how to become a farmer and is now pushing big rocks away from the yard]

[singing ironically]
The power of love is living, even if a mountain is laying in the middle of the road!
[Kiir kisses Teele on the cheek and Teele runs away]

[sarcastically]
Well, Jorh, how many cities did you see in Russia?

[throws a boot at him]
Shut up! What do you know about geography, you shitcrow!
[the priest is reading the text from the Bible during Toots's and Teele's wedding ceremony. Toots isn't listening the text]
[the priest continues the text and Toots loses his attention again]

[after Teele has given him a nudge]
Eh? Oh... Yes, I do!

[after putting the rings into their fingers]
What the God has joined together, a human being should not dismantle.
